property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
SET DATEFORMAT 'YMD'
select a11.id_producto CustCol, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo ID_Periodo, a11.id_producto id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto0, a11.grilla grilla, a12.de_grilla, sum(a11.comer_cant_altas_genuina) WJXBFS1 into #ZZTQQMUS8H5SP000 from H_ALTAS_GENUINAS a11 join D_GRILLAS a12 on (a11.grilla = a12.grilla and a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a12.id_producto = a13.id_producto) where (a11.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA) and a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.id_con_copago in ('X')) group by a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo, a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a12.de_grilla, a11.grilla
select a11.id_producto CustCol, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo ID_Periodo, a11.id_producto id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto0, a11.grilla grilla, a12.de_grilla, sum(a11.comer_cant_bajas_genuina) WJXBFS1 into #ZZTLWRSRV7DSP001 from H_BAJAS_GENUINAS a11 join D_GRILLAS a12 on (a11.grilla = a12.grilla and a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a12.id_producto = a13.id_producto) where (a11.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA) and a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.id_con_copago in ('X')) group by a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo, a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a12.de_grilla, a11.grilla
select a11.id_producto CustCol, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo ID_Periodo, a11.id_producto id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto0, a11.grilla grilla, a12.de_grilla, sum(a11.comer_cant_transferencia) WJXBFS1 into #ZZT35VPJUKPSP002 from H_COMER_TRANSFERENCIAS_CAB a11 join D_GRILLAS a12 on (a11.grilla = a12.grilla and a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a11.id_producto = a13.id_producto) where (a11.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA) and a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.id_con_copago in ('X')) group by a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo, a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a12.de_grilla, a11.grilla
select a11.id_producto CustCol, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo ID_Periodo, a11.id_producto id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto0, a11.grilla grilla, a12.de_grilla, sum(a11.comer_cant_cambio_plan) WJXBFS1 into #ZZTAE56KXIHSP003 from H_COMER_CAMBIO_PLAN_CAB a11 join D_GRILLAS a12 on (a11.grilla = a12.grilla and a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a11.id_producto = a13.id_producto) where (a11.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA) and a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.id_con_copago in ('X')) group by a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo, a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a12.de_grilla, a11.grilla
select a11.id_producto CustCol, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo ID_Periodo, a11.id_producto id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto id_plan_producto0, a11.grilla grilla, a12.de_grilla, sum(a11.comer_cant_grupo_activo) WJXBFS1 into #ZZT0UGIKWXLSP004 from H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA a11 join D_GRILLAS a12 on (a11.grilla = a12.grilla and a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a11.id_producto = a13.id_producto) where (a11.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA) and a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.id_con_copago in ('X')) group by a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a11.id_periodo, a11.id_producto, a11.id_plan_producto, a12.de_grilla, a11.grilla
INSERT INTO Consultas_DW.dbo.TMP_GRILLAS select distinct a16.id_con_copago id_con_copago, coalesce(pa11.de_grilla, pa12.de_grilla, pa13.de_grilla, pa14.de_grilla, pa15.de_grilla), coalesce(pa11.id_plan_producto, pa12.id_plan_producto, pa13.id_plan_producto, pa14.id_plan_producto, pa15.id_plan_producto) id_plan_producto, coalesce(pa11.grilla, pa12.grilla, pa13.grilla, pa14.grilla, pa15.grilla) grilla from #ZZTQQMUS8H5SP000 pa11 full outer join #ZZTLWRSRV7DSP001 pa12 on (pa11.CustCol = pa12.CustCol and pa11.ID_Periodo = pa12.ID_Periodo and pa11.grilla = pa12.grilla and pa11.id_plan_producto = pa12.id_plan_producto and pa11.id_plan_producto0 = pa12.id_plan_producto0 and pa11.id_producto = pa12.id_producto) full outer join #ZZT35VPJUKPSP002 pa13 on (coalesce(pa11.grilla, pa12.grilla) = pa13.grilla and coalesce(pa11.id_plan_producto, pa12.id_plan_producto) = pa13.id_plan_producto) full outer join #ZZTAE56KXIHSP003 pa14 on (coalesce(pa11.grilla, pa12.grilla, pa13.grilla) = pa14.grilla and coalesce(pa11.id_plan_producto, pa12.id_plan_producto, pa13.id_plan_producto) = pa14.id_plan_producto and coalesce(pa11.id_producto, pa12.id_producto, pa13.id_producto) = pa14.id_producto) full outer join #ZZT0UGIKWXLSP004 pa15 on (coalesce(pa11.grilla, pa12.grilla, pa13.grilla, pa14.grilla) = pa15.grilla and coalesce(pa11.id_plan_producto, pa12.id_plan_producto, pa13.id_plan_producto, pa14.id_plan_producto) = pa15.id_plan_producto and coalesce(pa11.id_producto, pa12.id_producto, pa13.id_producto, pa14.id_producto) = pa15.id_producto) join D_GRILLAS a16 on (coalesce(pa11.grilla, pa12.grilla, pa13.grilla, pa14.grilla, pa15.grilla) = a16.grilla and coalesce(pa11.id_plan_producto, pa12.id_plan_producto, pa13.id_plan_producto, pa14.id_plan_producto, pa15.id_plan_producto) = a16.id_plan_producto and coalesce(pa11.id_producto, pa12.id_producto, pa13.id_producto, pa14.id_producto, pa15.id_producto) = a16.id_producto) join D_CON_COPAGO a17 on (a16.id_con_copago = a17.id_con_copago)
drop table #ZZTQQMUS8H5SP000
drop table #ZZTLWRSRV7DSP001
drop table #ZZT35VPJUKPSP002
drop table #ZZTAE56KXIHSP003
drop table #ZZT0UGIKWXLSP004
